name: Alf in the Color Caves
summary: In this colorful and engaging game, guide ALF through the vibrant Color Caves using your joystick. Navigate diverse challenges, including squeezing through tight spaces and zigzagging around obstacles. Avoid the watchful Wufflegumps, whose contact will reset your progress. Reach the Color Room to see ALF change hues and perform a dance, then ascend to the start for increasingly difficult rounds. This adventure not only entertains but also helps children develop prediction, routing, and cause-and-effect understanding.
